metadata.title: CVE-2022-37048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The component tcprewrite in Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain aheap-based buffer overflow in get_l2len_protocol at common/get.c:344. NOTE:this is different from CVE-2022-27941.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
